verses.name: Isaiah 43:20
verses.text: The beast of the field shall honour me, the dragons and the owls: because I give waters in the wilderness, and rivers in the desert, to give drink to my people, my chosen.

verses.name: Isaiah 43:21
verses.text: This people have I formed for myself; they shall shew forth my praise.

verses.name: Isaiah 43:22
verses.text: But thou hast not called upon me, O Jacob; but thou hast been weary of me, O Israel.

verses.name: Isaiah 43:23
verses.text: Thou hast not brought me the small cattle of thy burnt offerings; neither hast thou honoured me with thy sacrifices. I have not caused thee to serve with an offering, nor wearied thee with incense.
